tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Witzling is very passionate and genuinely interested in what he teaches. Lectures are interesting and he is very adaptable to your specific class in terms of where they stand and the vibes the class gives out. He is a tough essay grader and not much is graded so you have to do well on what is handed in.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Alot of reading, which can sometimes feel unrewarding as certain works revcieve much more attention than others. Excellent at creating discussions and filling "voids" if students don\'t have a response. Very helpful at helping students develop writing skills via comments on papers and short "paragraphs" at the end of papers

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Lots of reading and hard tests. Not real sure what he wanted in some analysis assingments...

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Witzling is an absolute inspiration and this is witnessed through his evident passion. He pushes students to think critically and his skill at discussing themes which are often taboo is impeccable. If you do the reading, participate, and really follow up on his advice with your papers (and meet with him), you will do fine.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: witzlng is awkward. speaks too fast. can\'t understand him. doesn\'t really go in depth with the literature. i didn\'t like his class. had 3 papers each 5 pages each and like 3 tests.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He is quite an awkward person and seems very nervous when he teaches. Class is pretty boring, but there\'s not much work and if you ask for help then he will give it to you. There\'s a group presentation, midterm/final, and a few papers. Just do the work/readings and you\'ll be fine.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Witzling is a great professor. I took his Roots of Literature course and was extremely impressed. He is extremely passionate and spends a lot of time trying to put an interesting spin on the classics. Attendance and participation is mandatory, which seems to bother some people. Great professor if you\'re willing to put in the work!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He does come off a little awkward and nervous at first but he is clearly brilliant and is very helpful. He does put you on the spot because he expects you to be keeping up with the readings. The readings were really interesting and he is a fair grader.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: The negative comment below reveals more about that student than the prof--if you couldn\'t learn to use the proper "their," or to spell out the word "you," I suggest that Witzling isn\'t the moron! Writing drafts helped me with my writing, and I thought the reading was mostly interesting. Not a bad prof, just a lot of useless whiners in the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: The students who wrote bad comments were probably the people who didn\'t get good grades. I thought he was a very fair grader. Also, he was super helpful when I went to see him about my paper. He did come off a bit awkward and nervous at first, but he obviously knows what he is talking about.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: hands down the worst professor i have ever had in my entire life!!! he is rude, condescending, awkward, and outright incompetent! i would avoid his class like the plague!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: You don\'t know what he wants when it comes to papers, and tests. Seems to get very nervous, and wants students to participate. Gives a lot of reading (6 books in the semester). I wouldn\'t avoid him, but I wouldn\'t look forward to taking him either.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very nice. I really enjoyed his class. Fair grader.
